define: Get the content quality details (including content quality level, content issues, and system suggestions) for specific product list.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: error_invalid_item_list
error_list.description: Invalid item_id_list, please verify the ID and try again

Adopt suggested weight
Add video
Add at least 3 attributes
